heading: Who this is for
intro: Support for both teams and individual professionals.

teams.title: For teams & leaders
points: Struggling to motivate a team or reduce burnout?
Swamped with tasks leaders should delegate?
Want to upskill the team but not sure where to start?

individuals.title: For individual professionals
points: Ready for your next career step?
Planning to work or travel abroad?
Struggling to collaborate with international coworkers?
Prepping for an important presentation or meeting?
